Name: PX-T12 "Apex" Torpedo
Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 12

Behring precision meets devastating stopping power with the PX-T12 "Apex". Designed as an anti-ship and anti-installation weapon, Behring engineers worked tirelessly to ensure this torpedo was a bold strategic statement. The PX-T12 "Apex" features a wide blast radius ideal for when the ultimate defense is an overwhelming offensive attack.
